cms.transformation.TransformationCode:
<item>
  <id>{% ItemID %}</id> 
  {% foreach (document in LanguageVersions) { %}
     {% cultureCode = document.DocumentCulture.Replace("-", "").ToLower();; #%}
    <title_{% cultureCode %}><![CDATA[{% document.DocumentName #%}


</title_{% cultureCode %}>
    <url_{% cultureCode %}><![CDATA[{% document.AbsoluteUrl + "?lang=" + document.DocumentCulture #%}


</url_{% cultureCode %}>
    <description_{% cultureCode %}><![CDATA[{% document.DocumentSKUDescription %}


</description_{% cultureCode %}>
  {% } |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)d4e09225e9fc12746745cc4ac0df1c85d6d4b2bbcd1182dcfb9860827f4f74d0%}
  
  {% foreach (currency in Currencies) { %}
    {% currencyCode = currency.CurrencyCode.ToLower();; #%}
    <price_{% currencyCode %}>{% Math.Round(SKU.GetPrice(currency), currency.CurrencyRoundTo, "AwayFromZero") %}</price_{% currencyCode %}>
    <cur_{% currencyCode %}>{% currency.CurrencyCode %}</cur_{% currencyCode %}>
  {% } |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)951d69edcf9bd4cc2b5901133839503ed5bc28ef5c78d8c79a8218e5781e89d1%}
  
  <price>{% SKU.SKUPrice |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)a05c26ea70089189c7c47698556231d453442439e31b0e63c51135fce1b8ce4f%}</price>
  <image_link><![CDATA[{% GetAbsoluteUrl(SKU.SKUImagePath) |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)e01e24a2aafb9bbd5f4fe6762d5aefef016b5950b24631e4a6a86a9f6b06d354%}


</image_link>
  <category>{% ItemCategory %}</category>
  <SKUDepartmentID>{% SKU.SKUDepartmentID |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)b41581e24697ad78f218bbb4bdc3355dfc789a131e85b4efeaed12b6e334f40d%}</SKUDepartmentID>
  <SKUProductType><![CDATA[{% SKU.SKUProductType |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)630092c5352f0f936a19f2e06fb8f9bec33122de63939c2667890e2d27223e68%}


</SKUProductType>
  <SKUSupplierID>{% SKU.SKUSupplierID |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)d1d522725ed87ee59afe385fb3190d6ca1a1238a53fb28a26a0d852f35fdf597%}</SKUSupplierID>
  <SKUManufacturerID>{% SKU.SKUManufacturerID |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)41140c354d320b56c56a81aabcae4f878c773ab02e0fbd533275c7e8140ea5c7%}</SKUManufacturerID>
</item>
